name: Mergimals Kids
description:
*** No in-app purchases, no ads***

Create your own monsters called Mergimals! Every monster has its own individual look. Some are cute with big wide eyes, others are mysterious with colorful feathers and lanky legs. Combine two Mergimals of your choice to bring your own personal Mergimal into being!

Over time you will discover 15 mystical castles – home to many very different looking Mergimals to experiment with. Merge a pink butterfly Mergimal with a spooky lava monster Mergimal, or a skeleton Mergimal with a frog Mergimal. What will your new creation look like?

There are no limits to your experiments. Every Mergimal possesses up to 10 randomly inherited elements. There is even a twin monster Mergimal and a three-eyed cyclops Mergimal. Through different combinations of the basic elements, up to 100,000 different Mergimals can be created.

Educational aspects:
- intuitive control for children
- unleash your creativity and combine freely
- create unique, individual monsters

Content:
- 120 basic elements
- 15 mystical castles
- Interchangeable backgrounds
- More than 100,000 combination possibilities
